import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function OrdersPage() { // States to manage modal visibility and order data const [isModalOpen, setIsModalOpen] = useState(false); const [orderData, setOrderData] = useState({ orderId: "", customerName: "", platform: "Shopify", priority: "High", products: [], }); // State for adding a new product to the order const [newProduct, setNewProduct] = useState(""); // State to store the orders const [orders, setOrders] = useState([]); // Toggle Modal const toggleModal = () => { setIsModalOpen(!isModalOpen); }; return (
